askbot.admin¶

synopsis:connector to standard Django admin interface

To make more models accessible in the Django admin interface, add more classes subclassing django.contrib.admin.Model

Names of the classes must be like SomeModelAdmin, where SomeModel must exactly match name of the model used in the project

class askbot.admin.ActivityAdmin(model, admin_site)¶

Bases: django.contrib.admin.options.ModelAdmin
